title: What are some free OCR applications for the iPhone? - Quora

response.answer_text: OCR application for scanning what? Document, business card, or something else?  As I know, there is a free business card reader called ScanCard which you can searched on google play.  It is able to scan the business cards and extract any fields on the card, such as name, company name, job title, telephone number, fax, email, address. It can also automatically add the information into mobile phones' address book.  About the recognition speed, it will take about 0.6 seconds to scan a business card. The recognition accuracy can reach 98%.

I know there is a business card reader called ScanCard that can be installed in iPhone.  You can search it on Google Play or http://www.yunmai.com/en/products/bizcards_matter.html  It is able to scan the business cards you have, and use the built-in OCR engine to retrieve contacts info from those cards after scanning. You can choose to modify and save it to your contacts after the OCR engine finished its work. Hope it will be helpful for you.
